## Getting Started

### Prerequisites
- Go 1.22+ / Rust 1.75+ / vcpkg

### Build
```bash
make build
```

### Run
```bash
./bin/service-name --config config.yaml
```

## Configuration
| Env Var | Description | Default |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| `PORT` | HTTP Port | 8080 |

## Testing
Run unit tests:
```bash
make test
```
